麷麷麷

麷字的基本解释

麷
fēng
炒熟的麦子。
蒲草：“午其军，取其将，若拨麷。”

麷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fēng］
［《廣韻》敷空切，平東，敷。］
［《廣韻》撫鳳切，去送，敷。］
(1)炒过的麦子。
(2)通“豐”。蒲草。

麷字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【麥字部】　麷； 康熙笔画：29； 页码：页1514第55
【唐韻】敷戎切【集韻】敷馮切，?音豐。【說文】煑麥也。【周禮·天官·籩人】朝事之籩，其實麷蕡。【註】麷熬麥，今河閒以北煑種麥賣之，名曰麷。【儀禮·有司徹】麷蕡坐設於豆西，當外列，麷在東方。【荀子·富國篇】取其將若撥麷。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?撫鳳切，音賵。又【集韻】撫勇切，音捧。義?同。

麷字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
麷字的起名意思

暂无。

Glutinous rice
Basic explanation of words
Glutinous rice
fēng
Stir-fried wheat.
Pu Cao: "In the afternoon, its army, whichever will be the general, if the army is assigned to the army."
Glutinous rice
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fēng］
["Guangyun" apply empty cut, flat east, apply. ]
["Guangyun" Fufeng cut, sent and applied. ]
(1) Fried wheat.
(2) Through "Feng". Rush.
Glutinous rice
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haijixia】【Mic Character Department】　麷; Kangxi Strokes: 29; Page Number: Page 1514 55
[Tang Yun] Fu Rong Qi [Ji Yun] Fu Feng Qi,? Yin Feng. [Said the text] Fu Mai also. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Zhen Ren】The imperial court of the dynasty, in fact, is a glutton. [Note] Noodles boiled wheat, which is sold in the north of Jinhexian, and the name is noodles. 【Rituals·Yoshito】The noodles are located in Douxi, as the outer row, in the east. [Xunzi·Fu Guo Chapter] Whichever will be used.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui]? Fu Feng cut, sound. Also 【Jiyun】Foot and cut, sound and hold. Righteous? Same.
